text: "Cold Heart" is a 2021 song by English singers Elton John and Dua Lipa. The song is on John's 31st studio album, The Lockdown Sessions (2021). Lipa's part of the song samples lyrics from John's songs “Rocket Man" and “Sacrifice”. The PNAU remix was released as a single worldwide. It reached number one in the United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand and Canada. The song reached the top ten of the Billboard Hot 100 in the United States. Lipa has performed the song on her Future Nostalgia tour. == Charts == ===Weekly charts=== Chart performance for "Cold Heart" Chart (2021–22) Peak position Australia (ARIA) 1 Austria 3 Bulgaria 1 Canada (Canadian Hot 100) 1 Denmark 2 Finland 14 France 9 Germany 3 Ireland (IRMA) 2 Netherlands (Dutch Top 40) 2 New Zealand (RMNZ) 1 Norway 15 Portugal 2 Sweden 5 Switzerland 4 UK Singles (OCC) 1 US Billboard Hot 100 7 US Mainstream Top 40 (Billboard) 8 US Dance/Electronic Songs (Billboard) 1 US Adult Top 40 (Billboard) 1 US Adult Contemporary (Billboard) 1 ===Year-end charts=== Chart (2022) Position Canada (Canadian Hot 100) 1 US Billboard Hot 100 10 == References == Category:2021 songs Category:Dua Lipa songs Category:Elton John songs Category:Disco songs
